name: City Road Constuction Dozer 3D
description:
Truck Road Construction Dozer – is about driving & parking heavy vehicles like excavator cranes, trucks and building new roads and bridges in city. Show great control and see how good you are in building and riding something really massive and heavy!
*Show CREATIVITY in CONSTRUCTION in 3D Gaming Environment*
You think you got the creativity and skills to finish our missions for each level? Craftsmanship and skills are needed in one of the best free construction games. Dedication and fast learning are needed if you want to master this construction, excavating and driving game. Totally unique and nothing similar to the construction games online that combine only one or max two of these features. Everything is in stunning 3D graphics.
*Doze and EXCAVATE*
The goal of the game is to utilize your driving, parking and excavation skills in construction. It is a cool dozer game because you’ll need to move objects and fill what you excavated. It will be demanding and you’ll need to be fast and strategic to complete the constructions in each level. It can be listed in the excavation games category because of the amazing excavation possibilities.
*Driving and PARKING*
Not only vehicle, crane and truck driving skills, you need to show crane and truck parking skills as well. Sometime precision is crucial and you’ll need to totally control the vehicle. So besides the construction, this is ideal for someone that is in search of a driving truck games and truck parking games.
**Crane Road Construction Dozer FEATURES**
- Stunning HD Graphics
- 3D Doze, Construction and Driving game
- Unique heavy vehicles
- Easy controls
- Beautiful driving and excavation engine
- Challenging levels and missions
*ENJOY constructing and driving*
